location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered slightly from pest damage and the start of the address has been slightly obscured, however the intended recipient can still be easily identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a letter (not present) from Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, the Prince of Sheraz [Shiraz].
